landing_text: $(playername), Welcome to Create Conquest Arcane (CCA)! This guidebook is regularly updated to help playing and getting the most out of CCA.$(br2)Please checkout the new  $(l:https://claudiusminimuss-organization.gitbook.io/create-conquest-arcane/)Wiki$(/l) under construction. You are also invited to join $(l:https://discord.com/invite/jXrx4Tu)CM's World Discord$(/l).Thank you for playing CCA!$(br)ClaudiusMinimus
